name: Monsieur Veto
description:
Monsieur Veto had promised

Monsieur Veto had promised

To be loyal to his country; 

To be loyal to his country; 

But he failed to be,

Let's not do quarters. 

Let us dance the Carmagnole

Long live the sound

Long live the sound

Let us dance the Carmagnole

Long live the sound of the cannons.

You are King Louis XVI of France.

It is 1775.

You have been caught napping on your desk.

Quick! Act Natural! With any luck you might be able to prevent what is to come!

Play length ≈ 5 minutes

Comments and critique is highly appreciated!
